Content:
A simple file explorer that was born because I wanted to learn the Rust language.
It is operating system independent and trimmed for optimization.



The performance is provided by ["jwalk"](https://crates.io/crates/jwalk/versions) and ["Tauri"](https://tauri.app/).

CoDriver does not use path caching to access files and folders, so the performance is achieved by Rust, the speed of the disk and the power of the cpu. ‚ÅâÔ∏è Keep in mind that this software is still work in progress and will contain bugs!

# Links - Basic features
Translation:
Un explorateur de fichiers simple n√© parce que je voulais apprendre le langage Rust.
Il est ind√©pendant du syst√®me d‚Äôexploitation et optimis√© pour la performance.



La performance est assur√©e par ["jwalk"](https://crates.io/crates/jwalk/versions) et ["Tauri"](https://tauri.app/).

CoDriver n‚Äôutilise pas de cache de chemin pour acc√©der aux fichiers et dossiers, donc la performance est obtenue gr√¢ce √† Rust, √† la vitesse du disque et √† la puissance du CPU. ‚ÅâÔ∏è Gardez √† l‚Äôesprit que ce logiciel est encore en cours de d√©veloppement et contiendra des bugs !

# Liens - Fonctionnalit√©s de base

Content:
- Advanced features - Dependencies - FTP implementation (SSHFS) - Language support - Known issues - Todos - User interface - Speed comparison
## Basic features - Navigate through directories as you know it - Copy & Paste, delete, create and rename files and folders - Switch between "big buttons"-, list and miller columns mode - Close popups with esc - Jump to a directory with Ctrl / Cmd + G by inputting a path - Sort items in list mode by size, name or last modified
## Advanced features - Compress files and folders - zip - Unpack archives automatically into a new folder in the working directory - rar - zip - 7zip - tar (.gz, .bz2) - Navigate to a directory using the shortcut LAlt + 1 / 2 / 3 | (macOS option + 1 / 2 / 3) - Configure the paths yourself in the settings - Create file with F6 - Create folder with F7 - Start typing in a directory to instantly filter dir entries - Dual-Pane view - Search for files with F8 - Copy current selected element to other pane with F5 - Move current selected element to other pane with LShift + F5 - Drag and drop files into the explorer to copy them into the current directory - Multi rename your selection with Ctrl / Cmd + LShift + M - Run multi rename with Ctrl / Cmd + Return - File quick preview -> Select directory entry and tap the space bar.
Translation:
- Fonctionnalit√©s avanc√©es - D√©pendances - Impl√©mentation FTP (SSHFS) - Support linguistique - Probl√®mes connus - T√¢ches √† faire - Interface utilisateur - Comparaison de vitesse
## Fonctionnalit√©s de base - Naviguez dans les r√©pertoires comme vous en avez l'habitude - Copier & Coller, supprimer, cr√©er et renommer fichiers et dossiers - Basculer entre les modes "grosses touches", liste et colonnes Miller - Fermer les popups avec la touche √©chappement - Aller √† un r√©pertoire avec Ctrl / Cmd + G en saisissant un chemin - Trier les √©l√©ments en mode liste par taille, nom ou date de modification
## Fonctionnalit√©s avanc√©es - Compresser fichiers et dossiers - zip - D√©compresser automatiquement les archives dans un nouveau dossier du r√©pertoire de travail - rar - zip - 7zip - tar (.gz, .bz2) - Acc√©der √† un r√©pertoire avec le raccourci LAlt + 1 / 2 / 3 | (macOS option + 1 / 2 / 3) - Configurez vous-m√™me les chemins dans les param√®tres - Cr√©er un fichier avec F6 - Cr√©er un dossier avec F7 - Commencer √† taper dans un r√©pertoire pour filtrer instantan√©ment les entr√©es - Vue √† double panneau - Rechercher des fichiers avec F8 - Copier l‚Äô√©l√©ment s√©lectionn√© vers l‚Äôautre panneau avec F5 - D√©placer l‚Äô√©l√©ment s√©lectionn√© vers l‚Äôautre panneau avec LShift + F5 - Glisser-d√©poser des fichiers dans l‚Äôexplorateur pour les copier dans le r√©pertoire courant - Renommer en masse votre s√©lection avec Ctrl / Cmd + LShift + M - Lancer le renommage multiple avec Ctrl / Cmd + Entr√©e - Aper√ßu rapide du fichier -> S√©lectionnez une entr√©e du r√©pertoire et appuyez sur la barre d‚Äôespace.

Content:
- Supported files: all image files (.jpg, .png, ...), .pdf, .mp4, .json, .txt, .html - All other items will show a small tile with some information about it. (path, size, last modified) - Instant navigation -> Start typing and automatically filter the directory entries making it sometimes
much faster to navigate to a desired location
## Dependencies (If not working instantly)
Expand to show ### Linux - openssl1.1 #### Debian / Ubuntu
Translation:
- Fichiers support√©s : tous les fichiers image (.jpg, .png, ...), .pdf, .mp4, .json, .txt, .html - Tous les autres √©l√©ments afficheront une petite vignette avec quelques informations √† leur sujet. (chemin, taille, derni√®re modification) - Navigation instantan√©e -> Commencez √† taper et filtrez automatiquement les entr√©es du r√©pertoire, ce qui rend parfois la navigation vers un emplacement d√©sir√©
beaucoup plus rapide

RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## D√©pendances (Si cela ne fonctionne pas instantan√©ment)

Content:
```
sudo apt update
sudo apt install libwebkit2gtk-4.0-dev \
    build-essential \
    curl \
    wget \
    file \
    libssl-dev \
    libgtk-3-dev \
    libayatana-appindicator3-dev \
    librsvg2-dev
```
Translation:
```

sudo apt install libwebkit2gtk-4.0-dev \
    build-essential \
    curl \
    wget \
    file \
    libssl-dev \
    libgtk-3-dev \
    libayatana-appindicator3-dev \
    librsvg2-dev
```

Content:
```
sudo dnf check-update
sudo dnf install openssl1.1 \
    webkit2gtk4.0-devel \
    openssl-devel \
    curl \
    wget \
    file \
    libappindicator-gtk3-devel \
    librsvg2-devel
sudo dnf group install "C Development Tools and Libraries"
```
Translation:
```
sudo dnf check-update
sudo dnf install openssl1.1 \
    webkit2gtk4.0-devel \
    openssl-devel \
    curl \
    wget \
    file \
    libappindicator-gtk3-devel \
    librsvg2-devel
sudo dnf group install "C Development Tools and Libraries"
```

RowTranslations.translatedContent: sudo dnf group install "C Development Tools and Libraries"

Content:
## üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è Language Support - English - Option to choose between languages coming soon ...
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Known issues: - Drag and drop out of the window is currently not working on linux - On windows you may have to install [Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/windows/latest-supported-vc-redist?view=msvc-170) - Permissions on ms-windows are a little bit strange - You may have to run the program as administrator if you encounter problems to copy elements or something similar - There could be a problem you need to install openssl1.1 on linux systems, when the program does not start - ~~Tabs are not fully worked out yet~~
## üìù Todos: - Multiple languages - Favorites - Access online storage services (Google drive, etc.)
## User interface ### List style ![Screenshot 2024-08-13 at 19 08 02](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d643c7f9-44e8-4f94-a23c-69759b600c82) ### Grid style ![Screenshot 2024-08-13 at 19 08 00](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b28b346a-58f3-4f7c-a23d-b19f0695bf23) ### Miller column view ![Screenshot 2024-08-13 at 19 08 07](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/95ab9426-837f-492d-8139-9bf7f1f0c51e) ### Dual pane view ![Screenshot 2024-08-13 at 19 08 25](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a3f9a511-5e8f-44ed-95d3-1a59e2cba05b) ## Speed comparison Windows File Explorer: _39.83 sec._
CoDriver: **_0.81 sec._**

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/17116fa5-8f43-4339-a4ff-2525e7c94ae0 Windows File Explorer: _44.91 sec._
CoDriver: **_< 0.5 sec._** https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/169da3d0-06ac-4775-a631-5c5708ae4766
## How to contribute Setup your machine for developing tauri v1 applications: [Tauri prerequisites](https://tauri.app/v1/guides/getting-started/prerequisites)

When this is done just do ```git clone https://github.com/RickyDane/CoDriver``` or ```gh repo clone RickyDane/CoDriver``` in a location on your machine.

You should be able to run ```cargo tauri dev``` in the root directory of this project to start building and running CoDriver.
Be sure to have tauri-cli installed: ```cargo install tauri-cli```

## Star History #### Other third party software - DragSelect (https://github.com/ThibaultJanBeyer/DragSelect)

Une fois cela fait, faites simplement ```git clone https://github.com/RickyDane/CoDriver``` ou ```gh repo clone RickyDane/CoDriver``` dans un emplacement sur votre machine.

Vous devriez pouvoir ex√©cuter ```cargo tauri dev``` dans le r√©pertoire racine de ce projet pour commencer √† construire et lancer CoDriver.
Assurez-vous d'avoir tauri-cli install√© : ```cargo install tauri-cli```

## Historique des √©toiles #### Autres logiciels tiers - DragSelect (https://github.com/ThibaultJanBeyer/DragSelect)
